message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get $6000, you get $4000.  A good deal for you to start.
I think we can both do better than that, Alice. Let's start with a more even split. I'll take 5500, and you get 4500. We can adjust from there.
Bob, time is money, and it's literally costing me. I'll take a slight cut at $5800, you get $4200. Take it before inflation eats away at this deal!
